sqlMap.insert: --新增E3门店款号配置 insert into e3_storepdt_ftp (c_store_id, m_product_id, creationdate, modifieddate, isactive, ad_client_id, ad_org_id) values (select id from c_store where code = #STORE_CODE#, select id from m_product where name = #PRODUCT_CODE#, sysdate, sysdate, 'Y', 37, 37 )

isNotEmpty.isNotEmpty: delete from e3_storepdt_ftp where c_store_id=select id from c_store where code =#STORE_CODE# and m_product_id=select id from m_product where name =#PRODUCT_CODE#
delete from E3_BOS_STOREPDT where id=select from E3_BOS_STOREPDT STORE_CODE=#STORE_CODE# and PRODUCT_CODE=#PRODUCT_CODE#

sqlMap.select: --查询o2o订单ID select id from eb_orderso where eb_docno=#docno#

SELECT T.QTYCAN FROM V_FA_STORAGE T WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_STORE A WHERE T.C_STORE_ID = A.ID AND A.CODE = #order_sn#) --店仓编号 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM M_PRODUCT_ALIAS B WHERE T.M_PRODUCT_ID = B.M_PRODUCT_ID AND T.M_ATTRIBUTESETINSTANCE_ID = B.M_ATTRIBUTESETINSTANCE_ID AND B.NO = #outer_code#) --条码编号;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE C_VOUCHERS_VIP A SET A.C_VIPID=#vip_id# WHERE C_VOUCHERS_ID=#id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ID FROM C_VOUCHERS WHERE VOUCHERS_NO=#vouchers_no#
SELECT ID FROM eb_orderso WHERE EB_DOCNO=#ordercode#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE C_VOUCHERS A SET A.VOUCHERS_NO=#vouchers_no#
A.IDENTIFY_CODE=#identify_code#
A.VOU_TYPE=#vou_type#
A.VOU_DIS=#vou_dis#
A.AMT_DISCOUNT=#amt_discount#
A.AMT_ACOUNT=#amt_acount#
A.START_DATE=#start_date#
A.VALID_DATE=#valid_date#
A.IS_VALID=#is_valid#
A.IS_VERIFYED=#is_verifyed#
A.C_V_VOUCHERS_ID=(SELECT ID FROM C_VOUCHERS WHERE VOUCHERS_NO=#vouchers_template_no#)
WHERE A.VOUCHERS_NO=#vouchers_no#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.VOUCHERS_NO,A.ID, A.VOU_TYPE, A.VOU_DIS, A.AMT_DISCOUNT, A.AMT_ACOUNT, A.START_DATE, A.VALID_DATE, A.IS_VALID, A.IS_VERIFYED,B.C_VIPID,C.VOUCHERS_NO FROM C_VOUCHERS A LEFT JOIN C_VOUCHERS_VIP B ON B.C_VOUCHERS_ID=A.ID LEFT JOIN C_VOUCHERS C ON A.C_V_VOUCHERS_ID=C.ID WHERE A.VOUCHERS_NO=#vouchers_no# AND A.IS_VALID=#is_valid#
select VOU_TYPE, ID, VOUCHERS_NO, AMT_NOLES, IS_ALLSTORE from c_vouchers where is_templet='Y' and is_valid=#is_valid#
select * from BOS_E3_COLOR where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000
select * from BOS_E3_SIZE where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000
select * from BOS_E3_SIZEGROUP where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000
select * from BOS_E3_DIM where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000
select * from BOS_E3_PRODUCT where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000
select * from BOS_E3_STORE where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000
select * from BOS_E3_SUPPLIER where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000
select * from BOS_E3_TRANSFER where E3STATUS=1 and TYPE='Y' and ROWNUM <= 1000
select * from BOS_E3_TRANSFER where E3STATUS=1 and TYPE='N' and ROWNUM <= 1000
select * from BOS_E3_TRANSFERITEM where BOS_E3_TRANSFER_ID=#value#
select * from BOS_E3_LOCK where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000
select * from BOS_E3_LOCKITEM where BOS_E3_LOCK_ID=#value#
select * from BOS_E3_STORAGE where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000 order by API_FLAG
select * from BOS_E3_SKU where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000

select distinct ENTRYORDERCODE, OWNERCODE, WAREHOUSECODE, ORDERTYPE, EXPECTSTARTTIME, SUPPLIERCODE, NAME, MOBILE, PROVINCE, CITY, DETAILADDRESS, OPERATORNAME, DESCRIPT from BOS_E3_PURCHASE where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000 order by ENTRYORDERCODE
select ID, ITEMCODE, PLANQTY, PRICE from BOS_E3_PURCHASE where E3STATUS=1 and ENTRYORDERCODE=#value#

select distinct DELIVERYORDERCODE, OWNERCODE, WAREHOUSECODE, ORDERTYPE, CREATETIME, SUPPLIERCODE, NAME, MOBILE, PROVINCE, CITY, DETAILADDRESS, OPERATORNAME, DESCRIPT from BOS_E3_RETPUR where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000 order by DELIVERYORDERCODE
select ID, ITEMCODE, PLANQTY, PRICE from BOS_E3_RETPUR where E3STATUS=1 and DELIVERYORDERCODE=#value#

select distinct DELIVERYORDERCODE, OWNERCODE, WAREHOUSECODE, ORDERTYPE, CREATETIME, SUPPLIERCODE, CUSTOMERCODE, NAME, MOBILE, PROVINCE, CITY, DETAILADDRESS, OPERATORNAME, DESCRIPT from BOS_E3_SALE where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000 order by DELIVERYORDERCODE
select ID, ITEMCODE, PLANQTY, PRICE from BOS_E3_SALE where E3STATUS=1 and DELIVERYORDERCODE=#value#

select distinct ENTRYORDERCODE, ORDERTYPE, EXPECTSTARTTIME, WAREHOUSECODE, SUPPLIERCODE, OPERATORNAME, CUSTOMERCODE, NAME, MOBILE, PROVINCE, CITY, DETAILADDRESS, DESCRIPT from BOS_E3_RETSALE where E3STATUS=1 and ROWNUM <= 1000 order by ENTRYORDERCODE
select ID, ITEMCODE, PLANQTY, PRICE from BOS_E3_RETSALE where E3STATUS=1 and ENTRYORDERCODE=#value#
sqlMap.update:
update $table$ set E3STATUS=#status#
READTIME = sysdate
WRITETIME = sysdate
ERR_INFO = #errorinfo#
DESCRIPT = #descript#
where ID=#id#

update $table$ set E3STATUS=#status#
READTIME = sysdate
WRITETIME = sysdate
ERR_INFO = #errorinfo#
DESCRIPT = #descript#
where $keyname$=#id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into E3_BOS_STORE (STORE_CODE,STORE_NAME,IS_O2O_E3,E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #STORE_CODE#, #STORE_NAME#, #IS_O2O_E3#, 1, sysdate )
insert into E3_BOS_TRANCANCEL (DOCNO_E3,E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #DOCNO_E3#, 1, sysdate )

insert into E3_BOS_STOREPDT (STORE_CODE,STORE_NAME,PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_NAME,IS_O2O_E3,E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #STORE_CODE#, #STORE_NAME#, #PRODUCT_CODE#, #PRODUCT_NAME#, #IS_O2O_E3#, 1, sysdate )

insert into E3_BOS_TRANSFER (C_ORIG_CODE,C_DEST_CODE,DOCNO_E3,BILLDATE,C_TRANSFERTYPE, M_PRODUCTALIAS,QTY,QTYOUT,QTYIN,TYPE,E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #C_ORIG_CODE#, #C_DEST_CODE#, #DOCNO_E3#, to_date(#BILLDATE#,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #C_TRANSFERTYPE#, #M_PRODUCTALIAS#, #QTY#, #QTYOUT#, #QTYIN#, #TYPE#, 1, sysdate )

insert into E3_BOS_TRANQTY (DOCNO,DOCNO_E3,DATEOUT, M_PRODUCTALIAS,QTYOUT,QTYIN,E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #DOCNO#, #DOCNO_E3#, to_date(#DATEOUT#,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #M_PRODUCTALIAS#, #QTYOUT#, #QTYIN#, 1, sysdate )

insert into E3_BOS_CLOSE (
DOCNO,
E3CODE,C_STORE_CODE, BILLDATE,OUTDATE,IS_CLOSE,
STATUS,
E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values(
#DOCNO#,
#E3CODE#, #C_STORE_CODE#, to_date(#BILLDATE#,'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#OUTDATE#,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #IS_CLOSE#,
#STATUS#,
1, sysdate )
insert into E3_BOS_CLOSEM (E3CODE,M_PRODUCTALIAS,CQTY) values( #E3CODE#, #M_PRODUCTALIAS#, #CQTY# )
insert into M_E3CLOSER (E3CODE,C_STORE_CODE,IS_CLOSE,E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #E3CODE#, #C_STORE_CODE#, #IS_CLOSE#, 1, sysdate )
insert into M_E3CLOSERM (E3CODE,M_PRODUCTALIAS,UQTY) values( #E3CODE#, #M_PRODUCTALIAS#, #UQTY# )
insert into E3_BOS_RETSALE (E3CODE,C_ORIG_CODE,C_ORIG_NAME,E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #E3CODE#, #C_ORIG_CODE#, #C_ORIG_NAME#, 1, sysdate )
insert into E3_BOS_RETSALEITEM (E3CODE,M_PRODUCTALIAS,QTY) values( #E3CODE#, #M_PRODUCTALIAS#, #QTY# )
insert into E3_BOS_PURIN ( DOCNO, DATEIN, M_PRODUCTALIAS, QTYIN, E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #Docno#, to_date(#dateIn#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #ProductAlias#, #qtyIn#, 1, sysdate )

insert into E3_BOS_TRANQTY ( DOCNO, DOCNO_E3, DATEIN, M_PRODUCTALIAS, QTYIN, E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #Docno#, #Docno_E3#, to_date(#dateIn#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #ProductAlias#, #qtyIn#, 1, sysdate )

insert into E3_BOS_RETSALEIN ( ORDERTYPE, DOCNO, DATEIN, M_PRODUCTALIAS, QTYIN, E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #orderType#, #Docno#, to_date(#dateIn#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #ProductAlias#, #qtyIn#, 1, sysdate )
insert into E3_BOS_RETPUROUT ( DOCNO, DATEOUT, M_PRODUCTALIAS, QTYOUT, E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #Docno#, to_date(#dateOut#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #ProductAlias#, #qtyOut#, 1, sysdate )

insert into E3_BOS_SALEOUT ( ORDERTYPE, DOCNO, DATEOUT, M_PRODUCTALIAS, QTYOUT, E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #orderType#, #Docno#, to_date(#dateOut#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #ProductAlias#, #qtyOut#, 1, sysdate )

insert into E3_BOS_INVENTORY ( DOCNO_E3, C_STORE, BILLDATE, M_PRODUCTALIAS, QTYOUT, DESCRIPT,DOCTYPE, E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #DocnoE3#, #store#, to_date(#billdate#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #ProductAlias#, #qtyOut#, #remark#, #checkOrderId#, 1, sysdate )

insert into E3_BOS_RETAIL ( DELIVERYORDERCODE, WAREHOUSECODE, RETAILBILLTYPE, PLACEORDERTIME, PAYTIME, ITEMCODE, PLANQTY, ACTUALPRICE,
RECEIVER_NAME, SOREFERENCE4, C_PROVINCE_ID, C_CITY_ID, RECEIVER_DISTRICT, RECEIVER_ZIP, RECEIVER_ADDRESS, totalAmount, freight,
shopNick,
shop_nick,
buyer_nick,
DESCRIPT, E3STATUS,WRITETIME,expressCode,logisticsCode,logisticsName) values( #deliveryOrderCode#, #warehouseCode#, #RETAILBILLTYPE#, to_date(#placeOrderTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#payTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #itemCode#, #planQty#, #actualPrice#,
#receiverName#, #soReference4#, #province#, #city#, #area#, #zip#, #address#, #totalAmount#, #freight#,
#shopNick#,
#shop_nick#,
#buyer_nick#,
#remark#, 1, sysdate, #expressCode#,#logisticsCode#,#logisticsName# )

insert into E3_BOS_RETAIL_YM ( E3CODE, E3OLDCODE, E3BGCODE, C_ORIG_CODE, C_ORIG_NAME, M_PRODUCTALIAS, PRICE, RETQTY, TOT_AMT_PRICE, E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #E3CODE#, #E3OLDCODE#, #E3BGCODE#, #C_ORIG_CODE#, #C_ORIG_NAME#, #M_PRODUCTALIAS#, #PRICE#, #RETQTY#, #TOT_AMT_PRICE#, 1, sysdate )

insert into E3_BOS_RETAIL_WM ( E3BGCODE, C_ORIG_CODE, C_ORIG_NAME, M_PRODUCTALIAS, RETQTY, E3STATUS,WRITETIME) values( #E3BGCODE#, #C_ORIG_CODE#, #C_ORIG_NAME#, #M_PRODUCTALIAS#, #RETQTY#, 1, sysdate )

insert into E3_BOS_LOCKCFM ( BILLCODE, WAREHOUSECODE, OPTYPE, BILLDATE, WRITETIME, IS_ALLREAD
SKUCODE
QTY_CONFIRM
ERR_INFO
NOTE
)values( #BILLCODE#, #WAREHOUSECODE#, #OPTYPE#, #BILLDATE#, sysdate, #IS_ALLREAD#
#SKUCODE#
#QTY#
#ERRINFO#
#NOTE#
)

insert into E3_BOS_SOOUT ( BOS_DOCNO, SKU, QTYOUT, DATEOUT, DATETIME, EXPRESS_NAME, FASTNO, CREATIONDATE )values( #BOS_DOCNO#, #SKU#, #QTYOUT#, #DATEOUT#, #DATETIME#, #EXPRESS_NAME#, #FASTNO#, sysdate )
insert into E3_BOS_SOLESS ( BOS_DOCNO, RET_REASON, CREATIONDATE )values( #BOS_DOCNO#, #RET_REASON#, sysdate )
sqlMap.select: select max(ID) from $value$
select * from BOS_E3_SO where READSTATUS=0 and ROWNUM <= 1000
select * from BOS_E3_SOITEM where BOS_E3_SO_ID=#value#
sqlMap.update:
update $table$ set READSTATUS=#status#
READTIME = sysdate
ERR_MSG = #errorinfo#
where ID=#id#
